snippet.title: Torins Towers: Rise of Heroes v1.2 out now on Android, iOS and Steam
snippet.description:
https://torinstowers.com is a thrilling, free-to-play Action Strategy Game RTS, offering fast-paced multiplayer matches and a rich campaign of 80 singleplayer levels. Unlike traditional strategy games, your army is your most crucial resource here, serving multiple purposes - from building and upgrading to direct engagement in attacks.

Major update v1.2.0 with much improved tutorial
- Improved Tutorial
- Better controls
- Micromanagement focus to make controlling your units much more fun
- New target effects
- New cursors
- Faster download and smaller app size
- Progression Quests in addition to Daily Quests and Story Missions
- New battlepass is now available and ready
We worked a lot on tuning the gameplay experience based on your feedback.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1673670/Torins_Towers_Rise_of_Heroes/
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.deltaengine.towers
Apple App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/towers-rts/id1178379069?platform=iphone
#strategy #rts #freetoplay #game #gamedevelopment #unity #android #ios #steam #newgame #fun #action #mobilegame #heroes #leveling

- Experience adrenaline-fueled, challenging missions or engage in fast-paced multiplayer battles.
- Traverse through a gripping single-player campaign, mastering complex challenges along the way.
- Harness the power of unique heroes, using their distinct abilities to gain an edge on the battlefield and obliterate your foes.
- Compete against friends and players globally, striving for supremacy on the leaderboards.
- Command a varied force of soldiers, archers, and knights in an exhilarating real-time strategy setting.
- Dive into addictive online modes, pitting your wits against those of your friends.
- Enjoy the game's charming, hand-drawn visual style.
- Explore an expanding roster of heroes, continually unlocked as you progress.
- Experience the entire game without spending a dime. We appreciate any support through purchases of additional gold, optional skins, or faster progression, but they are entirely optional.

Join our vibrant community on:
Discord: https://discord.gg/eDgyyvTjZE
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@TorinsTowersRiseOfHeroes
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@towersrts
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TorinsTowers
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/towersrts/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/towersdev
